children.text: error: auth, not-found-user, not-found-server, wrong-data, exist
error: auth, not-found-user, not-found-task, wrong-data, forbidden

parameters.value: floor((Data.ArraySize("users." & userindex & ".data.tasks." & taskindex & ".data.to") - headerOffset) / ((Data.ArraySize("users." & userindex & ".data.tasks." & taskindex & ".data.to") - headerOffset) + Data.ArraySize("users." & userindex & ".data.tasks." & taskindex & ".data.toFailed") + Data.ArraySize("users." & userindex & ".data.tasks." & taskindex & ".data.toSuccess")) * 100)

floor(Data.ArraySize("users." & userindex & ".data.tasks." & taskindex & ".data.to") / (Data.ArraySize("users." & userindex & ".data.tasks." & taskindex & ".data.to") + Data.ArraySize("users." & userindex & ".data.tasks." & taskindex & ".data.toFailed") + Data.ArraySize("users." & userindex & ".data.tasks." & taskindex & ".data.toSuccess")) * 100)
Data.ArraySize("users." & userindex & ".data.tasks." & taskindex & ".data.to") - int(Data.Get("users." & userindex & ".data.tasks." & taskindex & ".temp.runCount"))
